Pre-Game Insights: The Pittsburgh Pirates are the favorites at -196 on the moneyline, reflecting their comparative stability and recent performance.
The total is set at 8.5, with both OVER and UNDER at -114, indicating a tight contest expected by the bookmakers.
Miami has seen 4 of their 5 last games go OVER the total points, and this might encourage the players to think that such a trend might hold in the next game, too.

The Pirates are in better form than the previous while showing a better 6-3 SU record, and as it can be observed the total goals scored in the games has also been increasing as the total has gone OVER in 7 of the last 9 games played at home.
Post-Match Reflections: Free Pick and Prediction: Pittsburgh Pirates 6, Miami Marlins 3
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will take place on a sunny Wednesday afternoon at Dodger Stadium.
Adam Mazur steps to the mound with a record of 1-3 with a 7.49 ERA, leaving much room for improvement.
Bailey Falter of the Pirates has a more steady 7-7 and an ERA of 4.45 in 121.1 innings.
Others: The odds are set with the Pittsburgh Pirates as the favorites at -196 on the moneyline.
The total is set at 8.5, with both OVER and UNDER at -114.
